title: पुलिसकर्मी द्वारा महिला को पीटने का वीडियो पिछले साल हरियाणा की घटना को दर्शाता है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: 1/3: Haryana Police Department has taken a strong view about the incident of beating of a woman by police personnel that appeared in media today. Faridabad Police has registered an FIR u/s 342/323/509 IPC against those responsible
